_meta._comment: Sort patch notes by: 1. Type, 2. mod, 3. text. Keep patch notes simple and concise.

changes.text: Added API-based stamina refill method: works when tab is in background, rate limited to 1 potion per 3s, uses lowest tier potions first, shows toast notifications, and checks inventory before each use
Added "Use API for Stamina Refill" toggle in Advanced section with warning about background usage and rate limiting risk
Refactored autorefill code with helper functions for better maintainability
Added Dungeon Ascension upgrade to inventory database and upgrade keys
Improved inventory display: added store prices to item tooltips and upgradeable status indicator
Fixed autoplant potentially selling creatures instead of devouring them by preventing autosell from running when autoplant is enabled
Removed Gummy Raider and Yeti from available and selected creatures lists
Improved Guilds mod styling: refactored font system to use centralized constants, standardized to system-ui font for consistency, and unified font sizes across all elements
Redesigned guild administration panel with professional card-based layout, moved Guild Points to top, and made everything more compact
Full translation support for popup interface (uses browser language, all buttons, messages, and mod descriptions translated)
Removed unused modsLoader.js file
Redesigned popup interface with store-like grid layout
Added search and filter functionality for mods
Added mod descriptions and category badges
Added patch notes tracking system
Better Highscores now supports configurable background opacity (0-100%)
Changed "User" category to "Custom"
Moved "Enable Welcome Page" button to Extras section
Removed dashboard
Ensured Better Highscores container maintains highest z-index for visibility
